author: Scott Polacek
title: Seton Hall Poll: 72% of Americans Won't Attend Games Without COVID-19 Vaccine
description: The vast majority of Americans reportedly will not feel safe attending a live sporting event again until there is a vaccine developed for COVID-19...
content:
Jonathan Daniel/Getty Images
The vast majority of Americans reportedly will not feel safe attending a live sporting event again until there is a vaccine developed for COVID-19.
According to a Seton Hall University poll, 72 percent of Americans asked said th… [+2098 chars]
